casebody.data:
YOUNG
v.
BAILEY, et al. No. 355PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Harvey L. Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for Young, Terri. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Winston-Salem, for Young, Terri. Sean F. Perrin, Charlotte, for Bailey, Daniel, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellant to Consolidate and/or Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
